name: Typographilic
description: A simple tool for creating typographic scales and systems.
author: Adam Waselnuk

scripts.doctor: npm -v && ruby -v && sass -v && echo 'READY TO ROCK!' || echo 'MISSING DEPENDENCY. Make sure you have installed npm, ruby, and sass.'
scripts.build:styles: npm run sass && npm run autoprefixer
scripts.develop: npm run build && parallelshell 'npm run watch'
